process.title: Thoughtful, Personalized Work
process.description: I take the time to understand your needs and build the right solution — never rushed, never recycled.

process.title: A Real Working Partnership
process.description: You’re kept in the loop at every step. No surprises, just clear communication and real collaboration.

process.title: Quality Over Shortcuts
process.description: I don’t cut corners. Every detail matters, and I only ship what I’m proud to put my name on.

process.title: Long-Term Collaboration
process.description: I’m here beyond launch. Many projects grow into lasting partnerships — and that’s the goal.

works.title: Custom-built Blog for EAYTHES
works.description: Designed and developed a clean, responsive blog platform that helps EAYTHES share updates, announcements, and news with its members more effectively. Built with Laravel, the site replaced their previous website with a faster, more practical, and visually polished experience.

works.title: Custom-built Website for Avramidis Visuals
works.description: Designed and developed in close partnership with their team, this website showcases Avramidis Visuals’ design capabilities through a clean, modern layout. It’s visually rich yet focused — helping potential clients quickly understand their creative strengths and portfolio quality.

works.title: Custom-built product showcase for Shooter's Roll
works.description: Built a clean, focused website that showcases Shooter’s Roll basketballs with clarity and style. The layout highlights product features and purchasing options, giving customers a smooth, distraction-free browsing experience.

works.title: Custom-built landing page for Spark Youth Center
works.description: Created a custom landing page that introduces visitors to Spark’s mission and space. With a simple and modern design, it highlights upcoming events and makes it easy for the community to stay connected and involved.

works.title: Custom-built one-page for VPaint
works.description: Designed and developed a custom landing page that introduces VPaint’s painting services with clarity and professionalism. It highlights their work, explains what they offer, and encourages visitors to reach out for quotes or consultations.

steps.title: We start with a conversation.
steps.description: I learn about your business, goals, and what success looks like — before ever writing a line of code.

steps.title: We define the path.
steps.description: I’ll create a clear proposal with deliverables, timeline, and budget — so we both know what’s ahead.

steps.title: We get organized.
steps.description: You get a personal dashboard with everything in one place — timeline, files, notes, and progress tracking.

steps.title: I bring it to life.
steps.description: With frequent updates, design previews, and check-ins, you’re always informed and never left in the dark.

steps.title: You see it before the world does.
steps.description: We test, polish, and tweak based on your feedback — making sure it’s perfect before launch.

steps.title: We go live, together.
steps.description: I handle deployment, make sure everything runs smoothly, and offer support or future collaboration.

projects.title: qrumbl.io
projects.description: A SaaS product. On Closed BETA. Visit to see some more.

projects.title: Animedoro Timer
projects.description: The Animedoro studying method (inspired by Pomodoro) timer is built to help every anime loving student balance studying and binging anime.

projects.title: Subnet Calculator
projects.description: Built to help me better understand the subnetting process, a tool to facilitate subnet calculations for IPv4 addresses.

projects.title: Ti na paraggeilo
projects.description: My first ever publication on github - An app to help my indecisiveness on what to order for food

projects.title: Multiple Gene Set Comparison Tool
projects.description: A mini frontent app that I made to help a friend with his research. He now compares gene sets all day...

projects.title: Notes App
projects.description: A humble PHP CRUD application that lets you manage your notes with ease. Built on the foundations of my quest to master PHP

projects.title: Budgetting App
projects.description: A university assignment to build a mobile app. My tool of choice is one that helps you track your expenses.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A task management app built with ancient technologies. A university assignment.
